definition: A substance that is essential for the growth, development, and maintenance of living organisms, typically found in food and used by the body to provide energy, promote growth, and sustain bodily functions. It is commonly discussed in the context of nutrition, diet, and health.

examples.german: Nährstoffe sind essentielle Bestandteile unserer Ernährung.
examples.english: Nutrients are essential components of our diet.

examples.german: Diese Lebensmittel enthalten viele wichtige Nährstoffe.
examples.english: These foods contain many important nutrients.

examples.german: Nährstoffmangel kann zu gesundheitlichen Problemen führen.
examples.english: Nutrient deficiency can lead to health problems.

examples.german: Pflanzen nehmen Nährstoffe aus dem Boden auf.
examples.english: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.

examples.german: Nährstoffe sind für das Wachstum und die Entwicklung des Körpers notwendig.
examples.english: Nutrients are necessary for the growth and development of the body.
